mehema kalina deyak liyapu eka watinawa.oyage thiyariyama wena widiyayakata mama karanawa.eken ithuru wena gana wagema sahalluwak thiyanawa.man karalama balala thiyana nisa kiyanne.man masa 5katha wage ekathu una salli serama 750rupiyal bankuwe damma.ara ganne nathi ginume.meki mage thiyariya.:) .hamadama kiyaka hari ,kohen hari ena maru salli, jara salli, 1, 2, 5, 10,20 wage ewwa ee wagema irunu salli 50 100 th thibba.eewa serama, parana jel iwara una bajanekata ekathu kara, karala mese gawin thibba.kohe gihin awat, sakku wala, bima thibba serama ekata damma.udeta yanakota, 1,2,5 wage ewwa tikak eken aragannawa.hamadama yana thana nisa, gana godak ehemehe wen na .hama thanama godak kasi aran yanda ooneth na ne.onna oya widiyata ratata sewayak karana gamanma ithirith karagaththa.test karanda wage thama masa 5k kare..asarthaka na .tep alawa alawa innawata wada ee salli prathichakrikaranaya dila eka ithuru karaganna eka watinawa kiyala hithuna.kochchara durata wedagath da dan na .honda nam mage thiyariyath ekathu karalama prayogikawa athhada balanda.

dilip kumar rangapa insaniyath hindi chithrapataya sinhala debas kawa pradarshanaya kala chithrapataye nama kumakda?wimal ranasinha – granpasmanushyathwaya.piyadasa gunasekara, layanal daraniyagala, domi jayawardhana, ech. di. kulathunga atharin wadath kamathi dushta naluwa kawuda?sarath ranasinha – malinda.domi jayawardhana.wiktar hiyugo ge ‘le misarable’ nawa kathawa, sinamasge ‘duppathage duka’, ayi. am. aar. ee. eeriyagollage ‘manuthapaya’, ha jathika rupawahiniyen pasugiya da wikashaya wu ‘duli pintharu’, yana mewa ekinekata samanayi neda?dadli gomas - moratuwa.ow, me siyallatama padaka wune wiktar hiyugo ge nawa kathawayi.kristi lenad perera gayana kala ‘amma kiya kiyatha haki ekama landakatayi’ yana githaye pada rachanaya kageda?wiyani gunawardhana - wennappuwa.karunarathna abesekara.dilip kumar thawama jiwathun atharada?sadhana begam – nuwaraeliya.dilip kumar thama jiwathun athara sitinawa.
